Package org.openbel.framework.common.cfg

Contains BEL framework configuration capabilities.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Configuration This class encapsulates a file-based configuration.
RuntimeConfiguration Provides a base class for runtime configuration capabilities.
SystemConfiguration Provides system configuration capabilities.
 

Package org.openbel.framework.common.cfg Description

Contains BEL framework configuration capabilities.

OpenBEL Framework Configuration

The BEL framework defines to configuration types: system configuration and runtime configuration. The location of configuration files are specified by: PathConstants

System Configuration

System configuration settings affect the installation of the BEL framework.

Runtime Configuration

Runtime configuration settings affect application behavior during runtime.
